original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Iddhibalavagga
analyzed: iddhi bala vagga

original: 2 Sabbaññubhāvapañha
analyzed: sabbaññu bhāva pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, buddho sabbaññū”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena buddhaḥ sabbaññu iti

original: “Āma, mahārāja, bhagavā sabbaññū, na ca bhagavato satataṁ samitaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ, āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṁ bhagavato sabbaññutañāṇaṁ, āvajjitvā yadicchakaṁ jānātī”ti.
analyzed: āma mahā rāja bhagavā sabbaññū na ca bhagavato satatam samitam ñāṇa dassanam paccupaṭṭhite āvajjana paṭibaddham bhagavataḥ sabbaññu ta ñāṇe āvajjitvā yadicchakam jānāti iti

original: “Tena hi, bhante nāgasena, buddho asabbaññūti.
analyzed: tena hi bhante nāgasena buddhaḥ a sabbaññu iti

original: Yadi tassa pariyesanāya sabbaññutañāṇaṁ hotī”ti.
analyzed: yadi tassa pariyesanāya sabbaññuta ñāṇam hoti iti

original: “Vāhasataṁ kho, mahārāja, vīhīnaṁ aḍḍhacūḷañca vāhā vīhisattambaṇāni dve ca tumbā
analyzed: vāha satam kho mahā rāja vīhīnam aḍḍhacūḷam ca vāhāḥ vīhi sattambaṇāni dve ca tumbā

original: ekaccharākkhaṇe pavattacittassa ettakā vīhī lakkhaṁ ṭhapīyamānā parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyyuṁ?
analyzed: ekaccharā khaṇe pavatta cittassa ettakā vīhī lakkham ṭhapīyamānā parikkhayam pariyādānam gaccheyyu

original: Tatrime sattavidhā cittā pavattanti—
analyzed: tatra ime sattavidhā cittā pavattanti

original: ye te, mahārāja, sarāgā sadosā samohā sakilesā abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā, tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ garukaṁ uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: ye te mahā rāja sa rāgā sa dosā sa mohā sa kilesāḥ abhāvita kāyāḥ abhāvita sīlāḥ abhāvita cittāḥ abhāvita paññā tesam tam cittam garukam uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Abhāvitattā cittassa.
analyzed: a bhāvita ttā cittassa

original: Yathā, mahārāja, vaṁsanāḷassa vitatassa visālassa vitthiṇṇassa saṁsibbitavisibbitassa sākhājaṭājaṭitassa ākaḍḍhiyantassa garukaṁ hoti āgamanaṁ dandhaṁ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja vasanāḷassa vitatassa visālassa vitthiṇṇassa sa sibbita visibbitassa sa ākhājaṭā jaṭitassa ākaḍḍhiyantassa garukam hoti āgamanam dandha

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Saṁsibbitavisibbitattā sākhānaṁ.
analyzed: sa sibbita visibbita ttā

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te sarāgā sadosā samohā sakilesā abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā, tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ garukaṁ uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye te sa rāgā sa dosā sa mohā sa kilesā abhāvita kāyā abhāvita sīlā abhāvita cittā abhāvita paññā tesam tam cittam garukam uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Saṁsibbitavisibbitattā kilesehi, idaṁ paṭhamaṁ cittaṁ.
analyzed: sa sibbita visibbita ttā kilesehi idam paṭhamam citta

original: Tatridaṁ dutiyaṁ cittaṁ vibhattamāpajjati—
analyzed: tatra idam dutiyam cittam vibhattam āpajjati

original: ye te, mahārāja, sotāpannā pihitāpāyā diṭṭhippattā viññātasatthusāsanā, tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ tīsu ṭhānesu lahukaṁ uppajjati lahukaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: ye te mahā rāja sotāpannāḥ pihita apāyāḥ diṭṭhi ppattāḥ viññāta satthu sāsanā tesam tam cittam tīsu ṭhānesu lahukam uppajjati lahukam pavattati

original: Uparibhūmīsu garukaṁ uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: upari bhūmīsu garukam uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Tīsu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddhattā upari kilesānaṁ appahīnattā.
analyzed: tīsu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddha ttā upari kilesānaṃ appahīna ttā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, vaṁsanāḷassa tipabbagaṇṭhiparisuddhassa upari sākhājaṭājaṭitassa ākaḍḍhiyantassa yāva tipabbaṁ tāva lahukaṁ eti, tato upari thaddhaṁ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja vasanāḷassa ti pabba gaṇṭhi parisuddhassa upari sākhā jaṭā jaṭitassa ākaḍḍhiyantassa yāva ti pabbam tāva lahukam eti tatas upari thaddha

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Heṭṭhā parisuddhattā upari sākhājaṭājaṭitattā.
analyzed: heṭṭhā parisuddha ttā upari sākhā jaṭā jaṭita ttā

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te sotāpannā pihitāpāyā diṭṭhippattā viññātasatthusāsanā,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye te sotāpannāḥ pihita apāyāḥ diṭṭhi ppattāḥ viññāta satthu sāsanāḥ

original: tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ tīsu ṭhānesu lahukaṁ uppajjati lahukaṁ pavattati, uparibhūmīsu garukaṁ
analyzed: tesam tam cittam tīsu ṭhānesu lahukam uppajjati lahukam pavattati upari bhūmīsu garuka

original: uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Tīsu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddhattā upari kilesānaṁ appahīnattā, idaṁ dutiyaṁ cittaṁ.
analyzed: tīsu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddha ttā upari kilesānaṃ appahīna ttā idam dutiyam citta

original: Tatridaṁ tatiyaṁ cittaṁ vibhattamāpajjati—
analyzed: tatra idam tatiyam cittam vibhattam āpajjati

original: ye te, mahārāja, sakadāgāmino, yesaṁ rāgadosamohā tanubhūtā, tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ pañcasu ṭhānesu lahukaṁ uppajjati lahukaṁ pavattati, uparibhūmīsu garukaṁ uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: ye te mahā rāja sakadāgāminaḥ yesam rāga dosa mohā tanu bhūtā tesam tam cittam pañcasu ṭhānesu lahukam uppajjati lahukam pavattati upari bhūmīsu garukam uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Pañcasu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddhattā upari kilesānaṁ appahīnattā.
analyzed: pañcasu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddha ttā upari kilesānaṃ appahīna ttā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, vaṁsanāḷassa pañcapabbagaṇṭhiparisuddhassa upari sākhājaṭājaṭitassa ākaḍḍhiyantassa yāva pañcapabbaṁ tāva lahukaṁ eti, tato upari thaddhaṁ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja vasanāḷassa pañca pabba gaṇṭhi parisuddhassa upari sākhā jaṭā jaṭitassa ākaḍḍhiyantassa yāva pañca pabbam tāva lahukam eti tatas upari thaddha

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Heṭṭhā parisuddhattā upari sākhājaṭājaṭitattā.
analyzed: heṭṭhā parisuddha ttā upari sākhā jaṭā jaṭita ttā

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te sakadāgāmino, yesaṁ rāgadosamohā tanubhūtā, tesaṁ taṁ
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja ye te sakadāgāminaḥ yesam rāga dosa mohā tanu bhūtā tesam ta

original: cittaṁ pañcasu ṭhānesu lahukaṁ uppajjati lahukaṁ pavattati, uparibhūmīsu garukaṁ
analyzed: cittam pañcasu ṭhānesu lahukam uppajjati lahukam pavattati upari bhūmīsu

original: uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Pañcasu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddhattā upari kilesānaṁ appahīnattā, idaṁ tatiyaṁ cittaṁ.
analyzed: pañcasu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddha ttā upari kilesānaṃ appahīna ttā idam tatiyam citta

original: Tatridaṁ catutthaṁ cittaṁ vibhattamāpajjati—
analyzed: tatra idam catuttham cittam vibhattam āpajjati

original: ye te, mahārāja, anāgāmino, yesaṁ pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni, tesaṁ taṁ
analyzed: ye te mahā rāja anāgāminaḥ yesam pañca orambhāgiyāni sayojanāni pahīnāni tesam ta

original: cittaṁ dasasu ṭhānesu lahukaṁ uppajjati lahukaṁ pavattati, uparibhūmīsu garukaṁ uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: cittam dasasu ṭhānesu lahukam uppajjati lahukam pavattati upari bhūmīsu garukam uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Dasasu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddhattā upari kilesānaṁ appahīnattā.
analyzed: dasasu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddha ttā upari kilesānaṃ appahīna ttā

original: Yathā, mahārāja, vaṁsanāḷassa dasapabbagaṇṭhiparisuddhassa upari sākhājaṭājaṭitassa ākaḍḍhiyantassa yāva dasapabbaṁ tāva lahukaṁ eti, tato upari thaddhaṁ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja vasanāḷassa dasa pabba gaṇṭhi parisuddhassa upari sākhā jaṭā jaṭitassa ākaḍḍhiyantassa yāva dasa pabbam tāva lahukam eti tatas upari thaddha

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Heṭṭhā parisuddhattā upari sākhājaṭājaṭitattā.
analyzed: heṭṭhā parisuddha ttā upari sākhā jaṭā jaṭita ttā

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te anāgāmino, yesaṁ pañcorambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni,
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja ye te anāgāminaḥ pañca orambhāgiyāni sayojanāni pahīnāni

original: tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ dasasu ṭhānesu lahukaṁ uppajjati lahukaṁ pavattati, uparibhūmīsu
analyzed: tesam tam cittam dasasu ṭhānesu lahukam uppajjati lahukam pavattati upari bhūmīsu

original: garukaṁ uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: garukam uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Dasasu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddhattā upari kilesānaṁ appahīnattā, idaṁ catutthaṁ cittaṁ.
analyzed: dasasu ṭhānesu cittassa parisuddha ttā upari kilesānaṃ appahīna ttā idam catuttham citta

original: Tatridaṁ pañcamaṁ cittaṁ vibhattamāpajjati—
analyzed: tatra idam pañcamam cittam vibhattam āpajjati

original: ye te, mahārāja, arahanto khīṇāsavā dhotamalā vantakilesā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā
analyzed: ye te mahā rāja arahantaḥ khīṇa āsavāḥ dhota malāḥ vanta kilesāḥ kata karaṇīyā

original: ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanā pattapaṭisambhidā sāvakabhūmīsu
analyzed: ohita bhārā an uppatta sadatthā parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanā patta paṭisambhidā sāvaka bhūmīsu

original: parisuddhā, tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ sāvakavisaye lahukaṁ uppajjati lahukaṁ pavattati, paccekabuddhabhūmīsu
analyzed: parisuddhā tesam tam cittam sāvaka visaye lahukam uppajjati lahukam pavattati paccekabuddha bhūmīsu

original: garukaṁ uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: garukam uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Parisuddhattā sāvakavisaye, aparisuddhattā paccekabuddhavisaye.
analyzed: parisuddha ttā sāvaka visaye a parisuddha ttā paccekabuddha visaye

original: Yathā, mahārāja, vaṁsanāḷassa sabbapabbagaṇṭhiparisuddhassa ākaḍḍhiyantassa lahukaṁ hoti āgamanaṁ adandhaṁ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja vasanāḷassa sabba pabba gaṇṭhi parisuddhassa ākaḍḍhiyantassa lahukam hoti āgamanam adandha

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Sabbapabbagaṇṭhiparisuddhattā agahanattā vaṁsassa.
analyzed: sabba pabba gaṇṭhi parisuddha ttā a gahana ttā vasassa

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te arahanto khīṇāsavā dhotamalā vantakilesā vusitavanto
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye te arahantaḥ khīṇa āsavāḥ dhota malāḥ vanta kilesāḥ vusitavantaḥ

original: katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanā pattapaṭisambhidā
analyzed: kata karaṇīyā ohita bhārā anuppatta sadatthā parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanā patta paṭisambhidā

original: sāvakabhūmīsu parisuddhā, tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ sāvakavisaye lahukaṁ uppajjati lahukaṁ
analyzed: sāvaka bhūmīsu parisuddhā tesam tam cittam sāvaka visaye lahukam uppajjati

original: pavattati, paccekabuddhabhūmīsu garukaṁ uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: pavattati paccekabuddha bhūmīsu garukam uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Parisuddhattā sāvakavisaye, aparisuddhattā paccekabuddhavisaye, idaṁ pañcamaṁ cittaṁ.
analyzed: sāvaka visaye a parisuddha ttā paccekabuddha visaye idam pañcamam

original: Tatridaṁ chaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ vibhattamāpajjati—
analyzed: tatra idam chaṭṭham cittam vibhattam āpajjati

original: ye te, mahārāja, paccekabuddhā sayambhuno anācariyakā ekacārino khaggavisāṇakappā
analyzed: ye te mahā rāja paccekabuddhā sayambhunaḥ an ācariyakāḥ eka cārinaḥ khagga visāṇa kappā

original: sakavisaye parisuddhavimalacittā, tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ sakavisaye lahukaṁ uppajjati lahukaṁ
analyzed: saka visaye parisuddha vimala cittā tesam tam cittam saka visaye lahukam uppajjati

original: pavattati, sabbaññubuddhabhūmīsu garukaṁ uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: pavattati sabbaññu buddha bhūmīsu garukam uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Parisuddhattā sakavisaye mahantattā sabbaññubuddhavisayassa.
analyzed: parisuddha ttā saka visaye mahanta ttā sabbaññu buddha visayassa

original: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso sakavisayaṁ parittaṁ nadiṁ rattimpi divāpi yadicchakaṁ acchambhito
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisaḥ saka visayam parittam nadim divā api yadicchakam a chambhitaḥ

original: otareyya, atha parato mahāsamuddaṁ gambhīraṁ vitthataṁ agādhamapāraṁ disvā bhāyeyya,
analyzed: otareyya atha paratas mahā samuddam gambhīram vitthatam agādham apāram disvā bhāyeyya

original: dandhāyeyya na visaheyya otarituṁ.
analyzed: dandhāyeyya na visaheyya otaritu

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Tiṇṇattā sakavisayassa, mahantattā ca mahāsamuddassa.
analyzed: tiṇṇattā saka visayassa mahantattā ca mahā samuddassa

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te paccekabuddhā sayambhuno anācariyakā ekacārino khaggavisāṇakappā
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye te paccekabuddhā sayambhunaḥ an ācariyakāḥ eka cārinaḥ khagga visāṇa kappā

original: sakavisaye parisuddhavimalacittā, tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ sakavisaye lahukaṁ uppajjati lahukaṁ
analyzed: saka visaye parisuddha vimala cittā tesam tam cittam saka visaye lahukam uppajjati

original: pavattati, sabbaññubuddhabhūmīsu garukaṁ uppajjati dandhaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: pavattati sabbaññu buddha bhūmīsu garukam uppajjati dandham pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Parisuddhattā sakavisaye mahantattā sabbaññubuddhavisayassa, idaṁ chaṭṭhaṁ cittaṁ.
analyzed: parisuddha ttā saka visaye mahanta ttā sabbaññu buddha visayassa idam chaṭṭham citta

original: Tatridaṁ sattamaṁ cittaṁ vibhattamāpajjati—
analyzed: tatra idam sattamam cittam vibhattam āpajjati

original: ye te, mahārāja, sammāsambuddhā sabbaññuno dasabaladharā catuvesārajjavisāradā aṭṭhārasahi
analyzed: ye te mahā rāja sammāsambuddhā sabbaññunaḥ dasa bala dharā catu vesārajja visāradā aṭṭhārasa hi

original: buddhadhammehi samannāgatā anantajinā anāvaraṇañāṇā, tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ sabbattha lahukaṁ
analyzed: buddha dhammehi samannāgatā ananta jināḥ anāvaraṇa ñāṇā tesam tam cittam sabbattha lahuka

original: uppajjati lahukaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: uppajjati lahukam pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Sabbattha parisuddhattā.
analyzed: sabbattha parisuddhattā

original: Api nu kho, mahārāja, nārācassa sudhotassa vimalassa niggaṇṭhissa sukhumadhārassa
analyzed: api nu kho mahā rāja nārācassa sudhotassa vimalassa niggaṇṭhissa sukhumadhārassa

original: ajimhassa avaṅkassa akuṭilassa daḷhacāpasamārūḷhassa khomasukhume vā kappāsasukhume
analyzed: a jimhassa a vaṅkassa a kuṭilassa daḷha cāpa samārūḍhassa khoma sukhume vā kappāsa sukhume

original: vā kambalasukhume vā balavanipātitassa dandhāyitattaṁ vā lagganaṁ vā hotī”ti?
analyzed: vā kambala sukhume vā balava nipātitassa dandhāyi tattam vā lagganam vā hoti iti

original: “Na hi, bhante”.
analyzed: na hi bhante

original: “Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Sukhumattā vatthānaṁ sudhotattā nārācassa nipātassa ca balavattāti;
analyzed: sukhuma ttā vatthānam sudhota ttā nārācassa nipātassa ca balava ttā ati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te sammāsambuddhā sabbaññuno dasabaladharā catuvesārajjavisāradā
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye te sammāsambuddhā sabbaññunaḥ dasa bala dharā catu vesārajja visāradā

original: aṭṭhārasahi buddhadhammehi samannāgatā anantajinā anāvaraṇañāṇā, tesaṁ taṁ cittaṁ
analyzed: aṭṭhārasahi buddha dhammehi samannāgatā ananta jināḥ anāvaraṇa ñāṇā tesam tam citta

original: sabbattha lahukaṁ uppajjati lahukaṁ pavattati.
analyzed: sabbattha lahukam uppajjati lahukam pavattati

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Sabbattha parisuddhattā, idaṁ sattamaṁ cittaṁ.
analyzed: sabbattha idam sattamam

original: Tatra, mahārāja, yadidaṁ sabbaññubuddhānaṁ cittaṁ, taṁ channampi cittānaṁ gaṇanaṁ atikkamitvā asaṅkhyeyyena guṇena parisuddhañca lahukañca.
analyzed: tatra mahā rāja yat idam sabbaññu buddhānam citta tam channam pi cittānam gaṇanam atikkamitvā asaṅkhyeyyena guṇena parisuddham ca lahukam ca

original: Yasmā ca bhagavato cittaṁ parisuddhañca lahukañca, tasmā, mahārāja, bhagavā yamakapāṭihīraṁ dasseti.
analyzed: yasmā ca bhagavato cittam parisuddham ca lahukam ca tasmai mahā rāja bhagavā yamaka pāṭihīram dasseti

original: Yamakapāṭihīre, mahārāja, ñātabbaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ cittaṁ evaṁ lahuparivattanti,
analyzed: yamaka pāṭihīre mahā rāja ñātabbam buddhānam bhagavantānam cittam evam lahu parivattanti

original: na tattha sakkā uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ vattuṁ, tepi, mahārāja, pāṭihīrā sabbaññubuddhānaṁ
analyzed: na tattha sakkā uttarim kāraṇam vattu te pi mahā rāja pāṭihīrā sabbaññu buddhāna

original: cittaṁ upādāya gaṇanampi saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi na upenti, āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṁ,
analyzed: cittam upādāya gaṇanam pi saṅkham pi kalam pi kala bhāgam pi na upenti āvajjana paṭibaddha

original: mahārāja, bhagavato sabbaññutañāṇaṁ, āvajjetvā yadicchakaṁ jānāti.
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavataḥ sabbaññuta ñāṇe āvajjetvā yadicchakam jānāti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso hatthe ṭhapitaṁ yaṁ kiñci dutiye hatthe ṭhapeyya vivaṭena
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisaḥ hatthe ṭhapitam yam kiñci dutiye hatthe ṭhapeyya vivaṭena

original: mukhena vācaṁ nicchāreyya, mukhagataṁ bhojanaṁ gileyya, ummīletvā vā nimīleyya, nimīletvā
analyzed: mukhena vācam nicchāreyya mukha gatam bhojanam gileyya ummīletvā vā nimīleyya nimīletvā

original: vā ummīleyya, samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya, cirataraṁ
analyzed: vā ummīleyya samiñjitam vā bāham pasāreyya pasāritam vā bāham samiñjeyya ciratara

original: etaṁ, mahārāja, lahutaraṁ bhagavato sabbaññutañāṇaṁ, lahutaraṁ āvajjanaṁ, āvajjetvā
analyzed: eta mahā rāja lahutaram bhagavataḥ sabbaññuta ñāṇa lahutaram āvajjane āvajjetvā

original: yadicchakaṁ jānāti, āvajjanavikalamattakena na tāvatā buddhā bhagavanto asabbaññuno nāma hontī”ti.
analyzed: yadicchakam jānāti āvajjana vikala mattakena na tāvatā buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ asabbaññunaḥ nāma honti iti

original: “Āvajjanampi, bhante nāgasena, pariyesanāya kātabbaṁ, iṅgha maṁ tattha kāraṇena saññāpehī”ti.
analyzed: āvajjanam pi bhante nāgasena pariyesanāya kātabbaḥ iṅgha mama tattha kāraṇena saññāpehi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, purisassa aḍḍhassa mahaddhanassa mahābhogassa pahūtajātarūparajatassa
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisassa aḍḍhassa mahat dhanassa mahā bhogassa pahūta jātarūpa rajatassa

original: pahūtavittūpakaraṇassa pahūtadhanadhaññassa sālivīhiyavataṇḍulatilamuggamāsapubbaṇṇāparaṇṇasappitelanavanītakhīradadhimadhuguḷaphāṇitā
analyzed: pahūta vittu upakaraṇassa pahūta dhana dhaññassa sāli vīhi yava taṇḍula tila mugga māsa pubbaṇṇa aparaṇṇa sappi tela navanīta khīra dadhi madhu guḷa phāṇi tā

original: ca khaḷopikumbhipīṭharakoṭṭhabhājanagatā bhaveyyuṁ, tassa ca purisassa pāhunako āgaccheyya
analyzed: ca khaḷopi kumbhi pīṭhara koṭṭha bhājana gatāḥ bhaveyyu tassa ca purisassa pāhunakaḥ āgaccheyya

original: bhattāraho bhattābhikaṅkhī, tassa ca gehe yaṁ randhaṁ bhojanaṁ, taṁ pariniṭṭhitaṁ
analyzed: bhattā rahaḥ bhatta abhikaṅkhī tassa ca gehe yam randham bhojana tam

original: bhaveyya, kumbhito taṇḍule nīharitvā bhojanaṁ randheyya, api ca kho so, mahārāja,
analyzed: bhaveyya taṇḍule nīharitvā bhojanam randheyya api ca kho saḥ mahā rāja

original: tāvatakena bhojanavekallamattakena adhano nāma kapaṇo nāma bhaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: tāvatakena bhojana vekallamattakena adhanaḥ nāma kapaṇaḥ nāma bhaveyyāti

original: “Na hi, bhante, cakkavattirañño gharepi, bhante, akāle bhojanavekallaṁ hoti, kiṁ pana gahapatikassā”ti?
analyzed: na hi bhante cakkavatti raññaḥ ghare pi bhante akāle bhojana vekallam hoti kim pana gahapatikassa ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgatassa āvajjanavikalamattakaṁ sabbaññutañāṇaṁ āvajjetvā yadicchakaṁ jānāti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgatassa āvajjana vikala mattakam sabbaññuta ñāṇam āvajjetvā yadicchakam jānāti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, rukkho assa phalito oṇatavinato piṇḍibhārabharito, na kiñci
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja rukkhaḥ assa phalitaḥ piṇḍi bhāra bharitaḥ na kiñci

original: tattha patitaṁ phalaṁ bhaveyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja, rukkho tāvatakena patitaphalavekallamattakena
analyzed: tattha patitam phalam bhaveyya api nu kho saḥ mahā rāja rukkho tāvatakena patita phala vekalla mattakena

original: aphalo nāma bhaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: aphalaḥ nāma bhaveyyāti

original: “Na hi, bhante, patanapaṭibaddhāni tāni rukkhaphalāni, patite yadicchakaṁ labhatī”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante patana paṭibaddhāni tāni rukkha phalāni patite yadicchakam labhati iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgatassa āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṁ sabbaññutañāṇaṁ āvajjetvā yadicchakaṁ jānātī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgatassa āvajjana paṭibaddham sabbaññuta ñāṇam āvajjetvā yadicchakam jānāti iti

original: “Bhante nāgasena, āvajjetvā āvajjetvā buddho yadicchakaṁ jānātī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena āvajjetvā āvajjetvā buddhaḥ yadicchakam jānāti iti

original: “Āma, mahārāja, bhagavā āvajjetvā āvajjetvā yadicchakaṁ jānātīti.
analyzed: āma mahā rāja bhagavān āvajjetvā āvajjetvā yadicchakam jānāti iti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, cakkavattī rājā yadā cakkaratanaṁ sarati ‘upetu me cakkaratanan’ti, sarite cakkaratanaṁ upeti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja cakkavattī rājā yadā cakka ratanam sarati upetu me sarite cakka ratanam upeti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato āvajjetvā āvajjetvā yadicchakaṁ jānātī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja tathāgataḥ āvajjetvā āvajjetvā yadicchakam jānāti iti

original: “Daḷhaṁ, bhante nāgasena, kāraṇaṁ, buddho sabbaññū, sampaṭicchāma buddho sabbaññū”ti.
analyzed: daḷha bhante nāgasena kāraṇa buddhaḥ sabbaññū sampaṭicchāma buddhaḥ sabbaññū ti

original: Buddhasabbaññubhāvapañho dutiyo.
analyzed: buddha sabbaññu bhāva pañhaḥ dutiyaḥ
